```{r}
library(rjson)
```

Read files:
```{r}
files = list.files(path = "../data",pattern="data_subject_.*.json")
these_data = vector()
for (i in 1:length(files)) {
  path = paste("../data/",files[i],sep="")
  print(path)
  c = file(path, "r")
  l = readLines(c, -1L)
  close(c)
  these_data[i] = lapply(X=l, fromJSON)
}
#Test that they loaded correctly
these_data[1][[1]]
```
